title: Google Maps Business Details
description: Extract detailed information for a specific business from Google Maps including ratings, reviews, photos, and operating hours.

business_id.title: Business ID
business_id.description: Google Maps business identifier in format: 0x[hex]:0x[hex] (e.g., 0x1234abcd:0x5678efgh). Obtain this from the Search or Autocomplete actor.

use_cache.title: Use Cache
use_cache.description: Use cached results if available to reduce costs and speed up results

maximum_cache_age.title: Maximum Cache Age (seconds)
maximum_cache_age.description: Maximum age of cached results in seconds. Set to 0 to always fetch fresh data.
